landing.in_store: Shopping in store? Scan this code!
landing.online: Shopping online? Use this code at checkout:
landing.heading: {senders_name} sent you a gift card!
landing.instruction1: Save the above code, or print this page for later.
landing.instruction2: Start shopping at {shop.name}, by going to {shop.domain}.
landing.instruction3: Find the item(s) you would like to purchase, and go to checkout.
landing.instruction4: Enter in the code from above in the gift card box to redeem your gift card.

purchase.gift_card_issued_after_checkout: Once checkout is completed, you will receive a confirmation email. The purchased gift card will be sent to the recipient on the selected delivery date and time, which will contain the gift card code, your message, and instructions on how to redeem it.

purchase.video_recorder_error_message: Enable access to your webcam and microphone by clicking the lock symbol and enabling your Camera and Microphone permissions. If your permissions are not visible, refresh the page and try sending a video message again.

purchase.video_recorder_tainted_thumbnail_message: To select a thumbnail image you must

sms.body: Your {{shop.currency}}{{giftcard.amount}} gift card for {{shop.name}} is active. Use the link below to redeem your gift card.

email.subject: {{giftcard.message_from}} sent you a gift card
email.body_text: Your {{shop.currency}}{{giftcard.amount}} gift card for {{shop.name}} is active. Keep this email or write down your gift card number.
email.footer_text: Please feel free to contact us at {{shop.email}} if you have any questions or face any problems.
email.purchaser_subject: Your gift card to {{giftcard.recipient_name}} has been delivered!
email.purchaser_body_text: The {{shop.name}} gift card you purchased for {{giftcard.recipient_name}} has been delivered.
